useCase.name: Specify New Product

preconditions.precondition: The user has the necessary information for the new product.

successEndConditions.condition: The new product information has been successfully entered.

useCase.trigger: SalesClerk wants to add a new product to the system.

mainSequence.step: Specify new product with Category, Photo, Short description, Extended description, Technical description, Brand, Reference, Internal code, Price, Barcode, Height, Width, Weight, Shelf.
Asks user for the product information.
Display product information and waits for confirmation.
